pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sahāyakassa gharaṃ gantvā tassa pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ sayanighare nisajjaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.3: Atha kho so puriso yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.7: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa bhikkhaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.8: Atha kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.10: Atha kho sā itthī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṃ puriso”ti, āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.13: tatiyampi kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.14: Tatiyampi kho sā itthī āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“nisīdatha, bhante, mā agamitthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.15: Atha kho so puriso nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.16: “ayaṃ, bhante, ayyo upanando mayhaṃ pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ sayanighare nisinno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.17: So mayā uyyojīyamāno na icchati gantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.21: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappessatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.22: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.25: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.26: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.27: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.28: “Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.7: kulaṃ itthī ceva hoti puriso ca, itthī ca puriso ca ubho anikkhantā honti, ubho avītarāgā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11: mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.12: Khuddake ghare piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1: Sayanighare sayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.2: Sayanighare vematiko sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.3: Sayanighare nasayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
